Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class roboptim::Polynomial< T >

Polynomial function.

Implement a polynomial function using the formula:

where polynomial coefficients are set when the class is instanciated

Examples:
finite-difference-gradient.cc, and function-polynomial.cc.

Function evaluation.

Evaluate the function, has to be implemented in concrete classes.

Warning:
Do not call this function directly, call operator()(result_t&, const argument_t&) const instead.

argumentpoint at which the function will be evaluated
